title: Sussur Dagger
content:
Sussur Dagger Rare 2~5 Damage 1d4 +1 PiercingSilences targets on hit. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Smoke like whorls of sussur sap darken the metal of this dagger's blade and silence its victims. Dagger Light Finesse Thrown 0.45 80

1d4 +1 PiercingSilences targets on hit.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Smoke like whorls of sussur sap darken the metal of this dagger's blade and silence its victims.
